document_data.name: Arcand
document_data.mainbody:
'''Mad Arcand''' was a rather deranged old [[sage]] whose ship crashed on the [[Sword Coast]] during the midâˆ’14{{th}} century [[DR]]., {{Quote|''I like you, yes I do
(wertle, wertle, wertle, wooo...)''|Mad Arcand}}
document_data.Description: He spoke in a rhythmic and at times nonsensical manner.
document_data.Personality: While his strange manners were quite suspicious, he was not actively antagonistic towards people he met.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Arcand went searching for his unique [[curse]]d ring, called the ''[[Discipliner]]''. He knew the ring to remain on the ship on which he was aboard.
